https://tmrev.io/movie/222033-A Belfast Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/TPFeiQV8WR0gUcWCBOdRb86i7p.jpg A BELFAST STORY explores life after terrorism. Set in a city which has weathered hundreds of years of hatred, 30 years of bombs, and a war without winners, just victims. A new era brings new risks. There is peace, but that can also be deadly. A Belfast Story
